feed.title: More appropriate XDG menu category for bitcoin-qt

entry.title: More appropriate XDG menu category for bitcoin-qt
entry.summary: In 2013, Matt Corallo announced the release of version 0.8.5 of Bitcoin. The announcement came on September 15th, with Corallo apologizing for the delay. The new version included a new category and was available for download from the Bitcoin Github repository. Kip Warner, a software engineer, thanked Matt for the update and provided his contact information, including a preference for OpenPGP encrypted/signed mail.
